game.name: Trivia Vault: Auto Racing Trivia
game.shortDescription: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault Auto Racing Trivia and bring your thinking hat. Answer auto racing trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value.
